com.base.engine

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.base.engine.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Door, Empty, GameButton, Item, Projectile

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines all objects in the game world All objects extend this class

    • Method Detail

      • init

        protected void init(float xPos,
                    float yPos,
                    int xStartLocation,
                    int yStartLocation,
                    int numFrames,
                    boolean theBoss,
                    java.lang.String imgPath,
                    int xImageWidth,
                    int yImageHeight,
                    int screenWidth,
                    int screenHeight)
        Initializes the game object
        Parameters:
        xPos - x-coordinate
        yPos - y-coordinate
        xStartLocation - x-coordinate on spritesheet
        yStartLocation - y-coordinate on the spritesheet
        numFrames - how many animations the gameObject will have.
        theBoss - boolean if gameobject is a boss
        imgPath - img path
        xImageWidth - physical width of img
        yImageHeight - physical height of img
        screenWidth - display width of img
        screenHeight - display height of img
